entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
